subtitle.translate: Create has everything. Or its addons..v

description: <text>This pack comes with <link href="https://modrinth.com/mod/create-ore-excavation"><blue><underline>Create: Ore Excavation</underline></blue></link> addon. Basically, you need to craft Ore vein finder and run around, poking it everywhere.</text>
In addition to regular infinite ore veins there is also special vein that can be found everywhere aside from overworld and contains every ore in this pack.
